verses.english: O LORD God, to whom vengeance belongeth; O God, to whom vengeance belongeth, shew thyself.

strongs_def: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
gloss: God (god), [idiom] goodly, [idiom] great, idol, might(-y one), power, strong. Compare names in '-el.'

strongs_def: avengement, whether the act of the passion
gloss: [phrase] avenge, revenge(-ing), vengeance.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
gloss: God (god), [idiom] goodly, [idiom] great, idol, might(-y one), power, strong. Compare names in '-el.'

strongs_def: avengement, whether the act of the passion
gloss: [phrase] avenge, revenge(-ing), vengeance.

strongs_def: to shine
gloss: be light, shew self, (cause to) shine (forth).

verses.english: Lift up thyself, thou judge of the earth: render a reward to the proud.

strongs_def: to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
gloss: accept, advance, arise, (able to, (armor), suffer to) bear(-er, up), bring (forth), burn, carry (away), cast, contain, desire, ease, exact, exalt (self), extol, fetch, forgive, furnish, further, give, go on, help, high, hold up, honorable ([phrase] man), lade, lay, lift (self) up, lofty, marry, magnify, [idiom] needs, obtain, pardon, raise (up), receive, regard, respect, set (up), spare, stir up, [phrase] swear, take (away, up), [idiom] utterly, wear, yield.

strongs_def: to judge, i.e. pronounce sentence (for or against); by implication, to vindicate or punish; by extenssion, to govern; passively, to litigate (literally or figuratively)
gloss: [phrase] avenge, [idiom] that condemn, contend, defend, execute (judgment), (be a) judge(-ment), [idiom] needs, plead, reason, rule.

derivation: from an unused root probably meaning to be firm;
strongs_def: the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
gloss: [idiom] common, country, earth, field, ground, land, [idiom] natins, way, [phrase] wilderness, world.

strongs_def: to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again
gloss: ((break, build, circumcise, dig, do anything, do evil, feed, lay down, lie down, lodge, make, rejoice, send, take, weep)) [idiom] again, (cause to) answer ([phrase] again), [idiom] in any case (wise), [idiom] at all, averse, bring (again, back, home again), call (to mind), carry again (back), cease, [idiom] certainly, come again (back), [idiom] consider, [phrase] continually, convert, deliver (again), [phrase] deny, draw back, fetch home again, [idiom] fro, get (oneself) (back) again, [idiom] give (again), go again (back, home), (go) out, hinder, let, (see) more, [idiom] needs, be past, [idiom] pay, pervert, pull in again, put (again, up again), recall, recompense, recover, refresh, relieve, render (again), requite, rescue, restore, retrieve, (cause to, make to) return, reverse, reward, [phrase] say nay, send back, set again, slide back, still, [idiom] surely, take back (off), (cause to, make to) turn (again, self again, away, back, back again, backward, from, off), withdraw.

strongs_def: treatment, i.e. an act (of good or ill); by implication, service or requital
gloss: [phrase] as hast served, benefit, desert, deserving, that which he hath given, recompense, reward.

derivation: properly, the same as H5920 (עַל) used as a preposition (in the singular or plural often with prefix, or as conjunction with a particle following);
strongs_def: above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

strongs_def: lofty; figuratively, arrogant
gloss: proud.

verses.english: LORD, how long shall the wicked, how long shall the wicked triumph?

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to extend;
strongs_def: properly, extent (of time); but used only adverbially (especially with other particle prefixes), when (either relative or interrogative)
gloss: long, when.

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to extend;
strongs_def: properly, extent (of time); but used only adverbially (especially with other particle prefixes), when (either relative or interrogative)
gloss: long, when.

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

strongs_def: to jump for joy, i.e. exult
gloss: be joyful, rejoice, triumph.

verses.english: How long shall they utter and speak hard things? and all the workers of iniquity boast themselves?

strongs_def: to gush forth; figuratively, to utter (good or bad words); specifically, to emit (a foul odor)
gloss: belch out, flowing, pour out, send forth, utter (abundantly).

strongs_def: perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue
gloss: answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, [idiom] well, [idiom] work.

derivation: from H6275 (עָתַק) in the sense of license;
strongs_def: impudent
gloss: arrogancy, grievous (hard) things, stiff.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

strongs_def: to do or make (systematically and habitually), especially to practise
gloss: commit, (evil-) do(-er), make(-r), ordain, work(-er).

derivation: from an unused root perhaps meaning properly, to pant (hence, to exert oneself, usually in vain; to come to naught);
strongs_def: strictly nothingness; also trouble. vanity, wickedness; specifically an idol
gloss: affliction, evil, false, idol, iniquity, mischief, mourners(-ing), naught, sorrow, unjust, unrighteous, vain, vanity, wicked(-ness). Compare H369 (אַיִן).

verses.english: They break in pieces thy people, O LORD, and afflict thine heritage.

strongs_def: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
gloss: folk, men, nation, people.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to crumble; transitively, to bruise (literally or figuratively)
gloss: beat to pieces, break (in pieces), bruise, contrite, crush, destroy, humble, oppress, smite.

strongs_def: properly, something inherited, i.e. (abstractly) occupancy, or (concretely) an heirloom; generally an estate, patrimony or portion
gloss: heritage, to inherit, inheritance, possession. Compare H5158 (נַחַל).

derivation: a primitive root (possibly rather identical with H6030 (עָנָה) through the idea of looking down or browbeating);
strongs_def: to depress literally or figuratively, transitive or intransitive (in various applications, as follows)
gloss: abase self, afflict(-ion, self), answer (by mistake for H6030 (עָנָה)), chasten self, deal hardly with, defile, exercise, force, gentleness, humble (self), hurt, ravish, sing (by mistake for H6030 (עָנָה)), speak (by mistake for H6030 (עָנָה)), submit self, weaken, [idiom] in any wise.

verses.english: They slay the widow and the stranger, and murder the fatherless.

strongs_def: a widow; also a desolate place
gloss: desolate house (palace), widow.

strongs_def: properly, a guest; by implication, a foreigner
gloss: alien, sojourner, stranger.

strongs_def: to smite with deadly intent
gloss: destroy, out of hand, kill, murder(-er), put to (death), make (slaughter), slay(-er), [idiom] surely.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be lonely;
strongs_def: a bereaved person
gloss: fatherless (child), orphan.

strongs_def: properly, to dash in pieces, i.e. kill (a human being), especially to murder
gloss: put to death, kill, (man-) slay(-er), murder(-er).

verses.english: Yet they say, The LORD shall not see, neither shall the God of Jacob regard it.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to see, literally or figuratively (in numerous applications, direct and implied, transitive, intransitive and causative)
gloss: advise self, appear, approve, behold, [idiom] certainly, consider, discern, (make to) enjoy, have experience, gaze, take heed, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] joyfully, lo, look (on, one another, one on another, one upon another, out, up, upon), mark, meet, [idiom] be near, perceive, present, provide, regard, (have) respect, (fore-, cause to, let) see(-r, -m, one another), shew (self), [idiom] sight of others, (e-) spy, stare, [idiom] surely, [idiom] think, view, visions.

derivation: contraction for H3068 (יְהֹוָה), and meaning the same;
strongs_def: Jah, the sacred name
gloss: Jah, the Lord, most vehement. Compare names in '-iah,' '-jah.'

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to separate mentally (or distinguish), i.e.(generally) understand
gloss: attend, consider, be cunning, diligently, direct, discern, eloquent, feel, inform, instruct, have intelligence, know, look well to, mark, perceive, be prudent, regard, (can) skill(-full), teach, think, (cause, make to, get, give, have) understand(-ing), view, (deal) wise(-ly, man).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

strongs_def: Jaakob, the Israelitish patriarch
gloss: Jacob.

verses.english: Understand, ye brutish among the people: and ye fools, when will ye be wise?

strongs_def: to separate mentally (or distinguish), i.e.(generally) understand
gloss: attend, consider, be cunning, diligently, direct, discern, eloquent, feel, inform, instruct, have intelligence, know, look well to, mark, perceive, be prudent, regard, (can) skill(-full), teach, think, (cause, make to, get, give, have) understand(-ing), view, (deal) wise(-ly, man).

derivation: a primitive root; also as denominative from H1198 (בַּעַר)
strongs_def: to kindle, i.e. consume (by fire or by eating);  to be(-come) brutish
gloss: be brutish, bring (put, take) away, burn, (cause to) eat (up), feed, heat, kindle, set (on fire), waste.

strongs_def: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
gloss: folk, men, nation, people.

strongs_def: properly, fat, i.e. (figuratively) stupid or silly
gloss: fool(-ish).

derivation: from an unused root meaning to extend;
strongs_def: properly, extent (of time); but used only adverbially (especially with other particle prefixes), when (either relative or interrogative)
gloss: long, when.

strongs_def: to be (causatively, make or act) circumspect and hence, intelligent
gloss: consider, expert, instruct, prosper, (deal) prudent(-ly), (give) skill(-ful), have good success, teach, (have, make to) understand(-ing), wisdom, (be, behave self, consider, make) wise(-ly), guide wittingly.

verses.english: He that planted the ear, shall he not hear? he that formed the eye, shall he not see?

strongs_def: properly, to strike in, i.e. fix; specifically, to plant (literally or figuratively)
gloss: fastened, plant(-er).

strongs_def: broadness. i.e. (concrete) the ear (from its form in man)
gloss: [phrase] advertise, audience, [phrase] displease, ear, hearing, [phrase] show.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] attentively, call (gather) together, [idiom] carefully, [idiom] certainly, consent, consider, be content, declare, [idiom] diligently, discern, give ear, (cause to, let, make to) hear(-ken, tell), [idiom] indeed, listen, make (a) noise, (be) obedient, obey, perceive, (make a) proclaim(-ation), publish, regard, report, shew (forth), (make a) sound, [idiom] surely, tell, understand, whosoever (heareth), witness.

strongs_def: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
gloss: (and, can-, doubtless, if, that) (not), [phrase] but, either, [phrase] except, [phrase] more(-over if, than), neither, nevertheless, nor, oh that, or, [phrase] save (only, -ing), seeing, since, sith, [phrase] surely (no more, none, not), though, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] unless, [phrase] verily, when, whereas, whether, while, [phrase] yet.

derivation: probably identical with H3334 (יָצַר) (through the squeezing into shape); (compare H3331 (יַצַע));
strongs_def: to mould into a form; especially as apotter; figuratively, to determine (i.e. form a resolution)
gloss: [idiom] earthen, fashion, form, frame, make(-r), potter, purpose.

strongs_def: an eye (literally or figuratively); by analogy, a fountain (as the eye of the landscape)
gloss: affliction, outward appearance, [phrase] before, [phrase] think best, colour, conceit, [phrase] be content, countenance, [phrase] displease, eye((-brow), (-d), -sight), face, [phrase] favour, fountain, furrow (from the margin), [idiom] him, [phrase] humble, knowledge, look, ([phrase] well), [idiom] me, open(-ly), [phrase] (not) please, presence, [phrase] regard, resemblance, sight, [idiom] thee, [idiom] them, [phrase] think, [idiom] us, well, [idiom] you(-rselves).

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to scan, i.e. look intently at; by implication, to regard with pleasure, favor or care
gloss: (cause to) behold, consider, look (down), regard, have respect, see.

verses.english: He that chastiseth the heathen, shall not he correct? he that teacheth man knowledge, shall not he know?

strongs_def: to chastise, literally (with blows) or figuratively (with words); hence, to instruct
gloss: bind, chasten, chastise, correct, instruct, punish, reform, reprove, sore, teach.

derivation: rarely (shortened) גֹּי; apparently from the same root as H1465 (גֵּוָה) (in the sense of massing);
strongs_def: a foreign nation; hence, a Gentile; also (figuratively) a troop of animals, or a flight of locusts
gloss: Gentile, heathen, nation, people.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to be right (i.e. correct); reciprocal, to argue; causatively, to decide, justify or convict
gloss: appoint, argue, chasten, convince, correct(-ion), daysman, dispute, judge, maintain, plead, reason (together), rebuke, reprove(-r), surely, in any wise.

strongs_def: properly, to goad, i.e. (by implication) to teach (the rod being an Oriental incentive)
gloss: (un-) accustomed, [idiom] diligently, expert, instruct, learn, skilful, teach(-er, -ing).

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

strongs_def: knowledge
gloss: cunning, (ig-) norantly, know(-ledge), (un-) awares (wittingly).

verses.english: The LORD knoweth the thoughts of man, that they are vanity.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to know (properly, to ascertain by seeing); used in a great variety of senses, figuratively, literally, euphemistically and inferentially (including observation, care, recognition; and causatively, instruction, designation, punishment, etc.)
gloss: acknowledge, acquaintance(-ted with), advise, answer, appoint, assuredly, be aware, (un-) awares, can(-not), certainly, comprehend, consider, [idiom] could they, cunning, declare, be diligent, (can, cause to) discern, discover, endued with, familiar friend, famous, feel, can have, be (ig-) norant, instruct, kinsfolk, kinsman, (cause to let, make) know, (come to give, have, take) knowledge, have (knowledge), (be, make, make to be, make self) known, [phrase] be learned, [phrase] lie by man, mark, perceive, privy to, [idiom] prognosticator, regard, have respect, skilful, shew, can (man of) skill, be sure, of a surety, teach, (can) tell, understand, have (understanding), [idiom] will be, wist, wit, wot.

strongs_def: a contrivance, i.e. (concretely) a texture, machine, or (abstractly) intention, plan (whether bad, a plot; or good, advice)
gloss: cunning (work), curious work, device(-sed), imagination, invented, means, purpose, thought.

strongs_def: ruddy i.e. a human being (an individual or the species, mankind, etc.)
gloss: [idiom] another, [phrase] hypocrite, [phrase] common sort, [idiom] low, man (mean, of low degree), person.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

derivation: or (prolonged) הֵמָּה; masculine plural from H1981 (הֲלַךְ);
strongs_def: they (only used when emphatic)
gloss: it, like, [idiom] (how, so) many (soever, more as) they (be), (the) same, [idiom] so, [idiom] such, their, them, these, they, those, which, who, whom, withal, ye.

derivation: or (rarely in the abs.) הֲבֵל; from H1891 (הָבַל);
strongs_def: emptiness or vanity; figuratively, something transitory and unsatisfactory; often used as an adverb
gloss: [idiom] altogether, vain, vanity.

verses.english: Blessed is the man whom thou chastenest, O LORD, and teachest him out of thy law;

strongs_def: happiness; only in masculine plural construction as interjection, how happy!
gloss: blessed, happy.

strongs_def: properly, a valiant man or warrior; generally, a person simply
gloss: every one, man, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: a primitive relative pronoun (of every gender and number);
strongs_def: who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
gloss: [idiom] after, [idiom] alike, as (soon as), because, [idiom] every, for, [phrase] forasmuch, [phrase] from whence, [phrase] how(-soever), [idiom] if, (so) that ((thing) which, wherein), [idiom] though, [phrase] until, [phrase] whatsoever, when, where ([phrase] -as, -in, -of, -on, -soever, -with), which, whilst, [phrase] whither(-soever), who(-m, -soever, -se). As it is indeclinable, it is often accompanied by the personal pronoun expletively, used to show the connection.

strongs_def: to chastise, literally (with blows) or figuratively (with words); hence, to instruct
gloss: bind, chasten, chastise, correct, instruct, punish, reform, reprove, sore, teach.

derivation: contraction for H3068 (יְהֹוָה), and meaning the same;
strongs_def: Jah, the sacred name
gloss: Jah, the Lord, most vehement. Compare names in '-iah,' '-jah.'

strongs_def: a precept or statute, especially the Decalogue or Pentateuch
gloss: law.

strongs_def: properly, to goad, i.e. (by implication) to teach (the rod being an Oriental incentive)
gloss: (un-) accustomed, [idiom] diligently, expert, instruct, learn, skilful, teach(-er, -ing).

verses.english: That thou mayest give him rest from the days of adversity, until the pit be digged for the wicked.

strongs_def: to repose (usually figurative)
gloss: appease, idleness, (at, be at, be in, give) quiet(-ness), (be at, be in, give, have, take) rest, settle, be still.

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be hot;
strongs_def: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
gloss: age, [phrase] always, [phrase] chronicals, continually(-ance), daily, ((birth-), each, to) day, (now a, two) days (agone), [phrase] elder, [idiom] end, [phrase] evening, [phrase] (for) ever(-lasting, -more), [idiom] full, life, as (so) long as (... live), (even) now, [phrase] old, [phrase] outlived, [phrase] perpetually, presently, [phrase] remaineth, [idiom] required, season, [idiom] since, space, then, (process of) time, [phrase] as at other times, [phrase] in trouble, weather, (as) when, (a, the, within a) while (that), [idiom] whole ([phrase] age), (full) year(-ly), [phrase] younger.

strongs_def: bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)
gloss: adversity, affliction, bad, calamity, [phrase] displease(-ure), distress, evil((-favouredness), man, thing), [phrase] exceedingly, [idiom] great, grief(-vous), harm, heavy, hurt(-ful), ill (favoured), [phrase] mark, mischief(-vous), misery, naught(-ty), noisome, [phrase] not please, sad(-ly), sore, sorrow, trouble, vex, wicked(-ly, -ness, one), worse(-st), wretchedness, wrong. (Incl. feminine raaah; as adjective or noun.).

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

strongs_def: properly, to dig; figuratively, to plot; generally, to bore or open
gloss: dig, [idiom] make (a banquet), open.

strongs_def: morally wrong; concretely, an (actively) bad person
gloss: [phrase] condemned, guilty, ungodly, wicked (man), that did wrong.

strongs_def: a pit (especially as a trap); figuratively, destruction
gloss: corruption, destruction, ditch, grave, pit.

verses.english: For the LORD will not cast off his people, neither will he forsake his inheritance.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: properly, to pound, i.e. smite; by implication (as if beating out, and thus expanding) to disperse; also, to thrust off, down, out or upon (inclusively, reject, let alone, permit, remit, etc.)
gloss: cast off, drawn, let fall, forsake, join (battle), leave (off), lie still, loose, spread (self) abroad, stretch out, suffer.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: a people (as a congregated unit); specifically, a tribe (as those of Israel); hence (collectively) troops or attendants; figuratively, a flock
gloss: folk, men, nation, people.

strongs_def: properly, something inherited, i.e. (abstractly) occupancy, or (concretely) an heirloom; generally an estate, patrimony or portion
gloss: heritage, to inherit, inheritance, possession. Compare H5158 (נַחַל).

derivation: or לוֹא; or לֹה; (Deuteronomy 3:11), a primitive particle;
strongs_def: not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
gloss: [idiom] before, [phrase] or else, ere, [phrase] except, ig(-norant), much, less, nay, neither, never, no((-ne), -r, (-thing)), ([idiom] as though...,(can-), for) not (out of), of nought, otherwise, out of, [phrase] surely, [phrase] as truly as, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] verily, for want, [phrase] whether, without.

strongs_def: to loosen, i.e. relinquish, permit, etc.
gloss: commit self, fail, forsake, fortify, help, leave (destitute, off), refuse, [idiom] surely.

verses.english: But judgment shall return unto righteousness: and all the upright in heart shall follow it.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
strongs_def: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed
gloss: and, + (forasmuch, inasmuch, where-) as, assured(-ly), + but, certainly, doubtless, + else, even, + except, for, how, (because, in, so, than) that, + nevertheless, now, rightly, seeing, since, surely, then, therefore, + (al-) though, + till, truly, + until, when, whether, while, whom, yea, yet.

derivation: properly, the same as H5703 (עַד) (used as a preposition, adverb or conjunction; especially with a preposition);
strongs_def: as far (or long, or much) as, whether of space (even unto) or time (during, while, until) or degree (equally with)
gloss: against, and, as, at, before, by (that), even (to), for(-asmuch as), (hither-) to, [phrase] how long, into, as long (much) as, (so) that, till, toward, until, when, while, ([phrase] as) yet.

strongs_def: the right (natural, moral or legal); also (abstractly) equity or (figuratively) prosperity
gloss: [idiom] even, ([idiom] that which is altogether) just(-ice), (un-)right(-eous) (cause, -ly, -ness).

strongs_def: to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again
gloss: ((break, build, circumcise, dig, do anything, do evil, feed, lay down, lie down, lodge, make, rejoice, send, take, weep)) [idiom] again, (cause to) answer ([phrase] again), [idiom] in any case (wise), [idiom] at all, averse, bring (again, back, home again), call (to mind), carry again (back), cease, [idiom] certainly, come again (back), [idiom] consider, [phrase] continually, convert, deliver (again), [phrase] deny, draw back, fetch home again, [idiom] fro, get (oneself) (back) again, [idiom] give (again), go again (back, home), (go) out, hinder, let, (see) more, [idiom] needs, be past, [idiom] pay, pervert, pull in again, put (again, up again), recall, recompense, recover, refresh, relieve, render (again), requite, rescue, restore, retrieve, (cause to, make to) return, reverse, reward, [phrase] say nay, send back, set again, slide back, still, [idiom] surely, take back (off), (cause to, make to) turn (again, self again, away, back, back again, backward, from, off), withdraw.

strongs_def: properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style
gloss: [phrase] adversary, ceremony, charge, [idiom] crime, custom, desert, determination, discretion, disposing, due, fashion, form, to be judged, judgment, just(-ice, -ly), (manner of) law(-ful), manner, measure, (due) order, ordinance, right, sentence, usest, [idiom] worthy, [phrase] wrong.

strongs_def: properly, the hind part; generally used as an adverb or conjunction, after (in various senses)
gloss: after (that, -ward), again, at, away from, back (from, -side), behind, beside, by, follow (after, -ing), forasmuch, from, hereafter, hinder end, [phrase] out (over) live, [phrase] persecute, posterity, pursuing, remnant, seeing, since, thence(-forth), when, with.

strongs_def: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
gloss: (in) all (manner, (ye)), altogether, any (manner), enough, every (one, place, thing), howsoever, as many as, (no-) thing, ought, whatsoever, (the) whole, whoso(-ever).

strongs_def: straight (literally or figuratively)
gloss: convenient, equity, Jasher, just, meet(-est), [phrase] pleased well right(-eous), straight, (most) upright(-ly, -ness).

strongs_def: the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
gloss: [phrase] care for, comfortably, consent, [idiom] considered, courag(-eous), friend(-ly), ((broken-), (hard-), (merry-), (stiff-), (stout-), double) heart(-ed), [idiom] heed, [idiom] I, kindly, midst, mind(-ed), [idiom] regard(-ed), [idiom] themselves, [idiom] unawares, understanding, [idiom] well, willingly, wisdom.

verses.english: Who will rise up for me against the evildoers? or who will stand up for me against the workers of iniquity?

derivation: an interrogative pronoun of persons, as H4100 (מָה) is of things,
strongs_def: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
gloss: any (man), [idiom] he, [idiom] him, [phrase] O that! what, which, who(-m, -se, -soever), [phrase] would to God.

strongs_def: to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
gloss: abide, accomplish, [idiom] be clearer, confirm, continue, decree, [idiom] be dim, endure, [idiom] enemy, enjoin, get up, make good, help, hold, (help to) lift up (again), make, [idiom] but newly, ordain, perform, pitch, raise (up), rear (up), remain, (a-) rise (up) (again, against), rouse up, set (up), (e-) stablish, (make to) stand (up), stir up, strengthen, succeed, (as-, make) sure(-ly), (be) up(-hold, -rising).

strongs_def: adverb or preposition, with (i.e. in conjunction with), in varied applications; specifically, equally with; often with prepositional prefix (and then usually unrepresented in English)
gloss: accompanying, against, and, as ([idiom] long as), before, beside, by (reason of), for all, from (among, between), in, like, more than, of, (un-) to, with(-al).

strongs_def: properly, to spoil (literally, by breaking to pieces); figuratively, to make (or be) good fornothing, i.e. bad (physically, socially or morally)
gloss: afflict, associate selves (by mistake for H7462 (רָעָה)), break (down, in pieces), [phrase] displease, (be, bring, do) evil (doer, entreat, man), show self friendly (by mistake for H7462 (רָעָה)), do harm, (do) hurt, (behave self, deal) ill, [idiom] indeed, do mischief, punish, still, vex, (do) wicked (doer, -ly), be (deal, do) worse.

derivation: an interrogative pronoun of persons, as H4100 (מָה) is of things,
strongs_def: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
gloss: any (man), [idiom] he, [idiom] him, [phrase] O that! what, which, who(-m, -se, -soever), [phrase] would to God.

strongs_def: to place (any thing so as to stay); reflexively, to station, offer, continue
gloss: present selves, remaining, resort, set (selves), (be able to, can, with-) stand (fast, forth, -ing, still, up).

strongs_def: adverb or preposition, with (i.e. in conjunction with), in varied applications; specifically, equally with; often with prepositional prefix (and then usually unrepresented in English)
gloss: accompanying, against, and, as ([idiom] long as), before, beside, by (reason of), for all, from (among, between), in, like, more than, of, (un-) to, with(-al).

strongs_def: to do or make (systematically and habitually), especially to practise
gloss: commit, (evil-) do(-er), make(-r), ordain, work(-er).

derivation: from an unused root perhaps meaning properly, to pant (hence, to exert oneself, usually in vain; to come to naught);
strongs_def: strictly nothingness; also trouble. vanity, wickedness; specifically an idol
gloss: affliction, evil, false, idol, iniquity, mischief, mourners(-ing), naught, sorrow, unjust, unrighteous, vain, vanity, wicked(-ness). Compare H369 (אַיִן).

verses.english: Unless the LORD had been my help, my soul had almost dwelt in silence.

derivation: or לוּלֵי; from H3863 (לוּא) and H3808 (לֹא);
strongs_def: if not
gloss: except, had not, if (...not), unless, were it not that.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: or עֶזְרָת; (Psalm 60:11 (13); Psalm 108:12 (13)), feminine of H5828 (עֵזֶר);
strongs_def: aid
gloss: help(-ed, -er).

strongs_def: a little or few (often adverbial or compar.)
gloss: almost (some, very) few(-er, -est), lightly, little (while), (very) small (matter, thing), some, soon, [idiom] very.

derivation: a primitive root (apparently akin (by transmission) to H7901 (שָׁכַב) through the idea of lodging; compare H5531 (סִכְלוּת), H7925 (שָׁכַם));
strongs_def: to reside or permanently stay (literally or figuratively)
gloss: abide, continue, (cause to, make to) dwell(-er), have habitation, inhabit, lay, place, (cause to) remain, rest, set (up).

derivation: from an unused root meaning to be dumb (compare H1820 (דָּמָה));
strongs_def: silence; figuratively, death
gloss: silence.

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

verses.english: When I said, My foot slippeth; thy mercy, O LORD, held me up.

strongs_def: used very widely as demonstrative, lo!; interrogative, whether?; or conditional, if, although; also Oh that!, when; hence, as a negative, not
gloss: (and, can-, doubtless, if, that) (not), [phrase] but, either, [phrase] except, [phrase] more(-over if, than), neither, nevertheless, nor, oh that, or, [phrase] save (only, -ing), seeing, since, sith, [phrase] surely (no more, none, not), though, [phrase] of a truth, [phrase] unless, [phrase] verily, when, whereas, whether, while, [phrase] yet.

strongs_def: to say (used with great latitude)
gloss: answer, appoint, avouch, bid, boast self, call, certify, challenge, charge, [phrase] (at the, give) command(-ment), commune, consider, declare, demand, [idiom] desire, determine, [idiom] expressly, [idiom] indeed, [idiom] intend, name, [idiom] plainly, promise, publish, report, require, say, speak (against, of), [idiom] still, [idiom] suppose, talk, tell, term, [idiom] that is, [idiom] think, use (speech), utter, [idiom] verily, [idiom] yet.

strongs_def: to waver; by implication, to slip, shake, fall
gloss: be carried, cast, be out of course, be fallen in decay, [idiom] exceedingly, fall(-ing down), be (re-) moved, be ready, shake, slide, slip.

strongs_def: a foot (as used in walking); by implication, a step; by euphemistically the pudenda
gloss: [idiom] be able to endure, [idiom] according as, [idiom] after, [idiom] coming, [idiom] follow, (broken-)foot(-ed, -stool), [idiom] great toe, [idiom] haunt, [idiom] journey, leg, [phrase] piss, [phrase] possession, time.

strongs_def: kindness; by implication (towards God) piety; rarely (by opposition) reproof, or (subject.) beauty
gloss: favour, good deed(-liness, -ness), kindly, (loving-) kindness, merciful (kindness), mercy, pity, reproach, wicked thing.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: to suport (mostly figurative)
gloss: comfort, establish, hold up, refresh self, strengthen, be upholden.

verses.english: In the multitude of my thoughts within me thy comforts delight my soul.

strongs_def: abundance (in any respect)
gloss: abundance(-antly), all, [idiom] common (sort), excellent, great(-ly, -ness, number), huge, be increased, long, many, more in number, most, much, multitude, plenty(-ifully), [idiom] very (age).

strongs_def: cogitation
gloss: thought.

strongs_def: properly, the nearest part, i.e. the center, whether literal, figurative or adverbial (especially with preposition)
gloss: [idiom] among, [idiom] before, bowels, [idiom] unto charge, [phrase] eat (up), [idiom] heart, [idiom] him, [idiom] in, inward ([idiom] -ly, part, -s, thought), midst, [phrase] out of, purtenance, [idiom] therein, [idiom] through, [idiom] within self.

derivation: or תַּנְחֻם; and (feminine) תַּנְחוּמָה; from H5162 (נָחַם);
strongs_def: compassion, solace
gloss: comfort, consolation.

strongs_def: (in a good acceptation) to look upon (with complacency), i.e. fondle, please or amuse (self); (in a bad one) to look about (in dismay), i.e. stare
gloss: cry (out) (by confusion with H7768 (שָׁוַע)), dandle, delight (self), play, shut.

strongs_def: properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
gloss: any, appetite, beast, body, breath, creature, [idiom] dead(-ly), desire, [idiom] (dis-) contented, [idiom] fish, ghost, [phrase] greedy, he, heart(-y), (hath, [idiom] jeopardy of) life ([idiom] in jeopardy), lust, man, me, mind, mortally, one, own, person, pleasure, (her-, him-, my-, thy-) self, them (your) -selves, [phrase] slay, soul, [phrase] tablet, they, thing, ([idiom] she) will, [idiom] would have it.

verses.english: Shall the throne of iniquity have fellowship with thee, which frameth mischief by a law?

strongs_def: to join (literally or figuratively); specifically (by means of spells) to fascinate
gloss: charm(-er), be compact, couple (together), have fellowship with, heap up, join (self, together), league.

strongs_def: properly, covered, i.e. a throne (as canopied)
gloss: seat, stool, throne.

derivation: from H1933 (הָוָא) (in the sense of eagerly coveting and rushing upon;
strongs_def: by implication, of falling); desire; also ruin
gloss: calamity, iniquity, mischief, mischievous (thing), naughtiness, naughty, noisome, perverse thing, substance, very wickedness.

derivation: probably identical with H3334 (יָצַר) (through the squeezing into shape); (compare H3331 (יַצַע));
strongs_def: to mould into a form; especially as apotter; figuratively, to determine (i.e. form a resolution)
gloss: [idiom] earthen, fashion, form, frame, make(-r), potter, purpose.

strongs_def: toil, i.e. wearing effort; hence, worry, wheth. of body or mind
gloss: grievance(-vousness), iniquity, labour, mischief, miserable(-sery), pain(-ful), perverseness, sorrow, toil, travail, trouble, wearisome, wickedness.

verses.english: They gather themselves together against the soul of the righteous, and condemn the innocent blood.

strongs_def: to crowd; also to gash (as if by pressing into)
gloss: assemble (selves by troops), gather (selves together, self in troops), cut selves.

strongs_def: just
gloss: just, lawful, righteous (man).

strongs_def: blood (as that which when shed causes death) of man or an animal; by analogy, the juice of the grape; figuratively (especially in the plural) bloodshed (i.e. drops of blood)
gloss: blood(-y, -guiltiness, (-thirsty), [phrase] innocent.

strongs_def: innocent
gloss: blameless, clean, clear, exempted, free, guiltless, innocent, quit.

strongs_def: to be (causatively, do or declare) wrong; by implication, to disturb, violate
gloss: condemn, make trouble, vex, be (commit, deal, depart, do) wicked(-ly, -ness).

verses.english: But the LORD is my defence; and my God is the rock of my refuge.

strongs_def: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
gloss: beacon, [idiom] altogether, be(-come), accomplished, committed, like), break, cause, come (to pass), do, faint, fall, [phrase] follow, happen, [idiom] have, last, pertain, quit (one-) self, require, [idiom] use.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

derivation: from H7682 (שָׂגַב); properly, a cliff (or other lofty or inaccessible place); abstractly, altitude; figuratively, a refuge

gloss: Misgab.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

gloss: edge, [idiom] (mighty) God (one), rock, [idiom] sharp, stone, [idiom] strength, [idiom] strong. See also H1049 (בֵּית צוּר).

strongs_def: a shelter (literally or figuratively)
gloss: hope, (place of) refuge, shelter, trust.

verses.english: And he shall bring upon them their own iniquity, and shall cut them off in their own wickedness; yea, the LORD our God shall cut them off.

gloss: above, according to(-ly), after, (as) against, among, and, [idiom] as, at, because of, beside (the rest of), between, beyond the time, [idiom] both and, by (reason of), [idiom] had the charge of, concerning for, in (that), (forth, out) of, (from) (off), (up-) on, over, than, through(-out), to, touching, [idiom] with.

derivation: apparent contracted from H226 (אוֹת) in the demonstrative sense of entity;
strongs_def: properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
gloss: (as such unrepresented in English).

derivation: from an unused root perhaps meaning properly, to pant (hence, to exert oneself, usually in vain; to come to naught);
strongs_def: strictly nothingness; also trouble. vanity, wickedness; specifically an idol
gloss: affliction, evil, false, idol, iniquity, mischief, mourners(-ing), naught, sorrow, unjust, unrighteous, vain, vanity, wicked(-ness). Compare H369 (אַיִן).

strongs_def: bad or (as noun) evil (natural or moral)
gloss: adversity, affliction, bad, calamity, [phrase] displease(-ure), distress, evil((-favouredness), man, thing), [phrase] exceedingly, [idiom] great, grief(-vous), harm, heavy, hurt(-ful), ill (favoured), [phrase] mark, mischief(-vous), misery, naught(-ty), noisome, [phrase] not please, sad(-ly), sore, sorrow, trouble, vex, wicked(-ly, -ness, one), worse(-st), wretchedness, wrong. (Incl. feminine raaah; as adjective or noun.).

strongs_def: to extirpate (literally or figuratively)
gloss: consume, cut off, destroy, vanish.

strongs_def: to extirpate (literally or figuratively)
gloss: consume, cut off, destroy, vanish.

strongs_def: Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
gloss: Jehovah, the Lord. Compare H3050 (יָהּ), H3069 (יְהֹוִה).

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.
